mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO appointment (book_id, student_id) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{studentId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.book_id, a.student_id, a.appoint_time, b.book_id "book.book_id", b.`name` "book.name", b.number "book.number" FROM appointment a INNER JOIN book b ON a.book_id = b.book_id WHERE a.book_id = #{bookId} AND a.student_id = #{studentId}
